desaddvideobutton.description: Show the add button from this YouTube video.
desaddvideobutton.message: Show the add button from this YouTube video.

desalllightsoff.description: If this option is enabled, and you click on the lamp button. All open tabs will go dark.
desalllightsoff.message: If this option is enabled, and you click on the lamp button. All open tabs will go dark.

desambilight.description: Show you the atmosphere lighting effect of the current playing video.
desambilight.message: Show you the atmosphere lighting effect of the current playing video.

desambilightrangeblurradius.description: If set a lower value the shadow will be sharp, the higher the number, the more blurred it will be.
desambilightrangeblurradius.message: If set to a lower value the shadow will be sharp, the higher the number, the more blurred it will be.

desambilightrangespreadradius.description: Positive values increase the size of the shadow, negative values decrease the size.
desambilightrangespreadradius.message: Positive values increase the size of the shadow, negative values decrease the size.

desambilightvarcolor.description: Take the color from the video.
desambilightvarcolor.message: Take the color from the video.

desatmosphereonly.description: Use the atmosphere lighting feature only the following video site:
desatmosphereonly.message: Use the atmosphere lighting feature only the following video site:

desautoplay.description: Automatically dim the background when you click the play button and versus.
desautoplay.message: Автоматично затъмни страницата когато натиснеш бутона Play.

desautoplayonly.description: Dim only the following video site:
desautoplayonly.message: Dim only the following video site:

descontextmenus.description: Show the context menu to focus an item.
descontextmenus.message: Покажи контекстното меню когато натиснеш десен бутон върху видео.

description.description: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.
description.message: Цялата страница ще потъмнее така, че да гледате видео сякаш сте в киносалона.

desenterpassword.description: Enter you password in the inputbox here below:
desenterpassword.message: Enter you password in the inputbox here below:

deseyea.description: Automatically dim the background when opening a page.
deseyea.message: Автоматично затъмни екрана когато отвориш нова страница.

deseyealist.description: Automatically dim the background when open the following page:
deseyealist.message: Автоматично замъглявай фона когато отворите следната страница:

deseyen.description: Normal use (lights go out when you click on the lamp icon).
deseyen.message: Нормален режим (изключи светлината като натиснеш иконата лампичка).

deseyetimesaver.description: When the page is inactive (no mouse movement), it go automatic dark in the chosen seconds.
deseyetimesaver.message: When the page is inactive (no mouse movement), it go automatic dark in the chosen seconds.

deshardflash.description: Show all Flash objects, and skip the URL control. So website ads may also show up.
deshardflash.message: Show all Flash objects, and skip the URL control. So website ads may also show up.

deshead.description: Show the YouTube Channel bar or the name.
deshead.message: Не скривай YouTube каналите и името на канала.

desinfobar.description: Show the description information about the video.

deslikebar.description: Show the like/dislike bar from this YouTube video.
deslikebar.message: Show the like/dislike bar from this YouTube video.

deslikebutton.description: Show the like & dislike buttons of YouTube for this video.

desmousespotlighta.description: If the light is off, show a spotlight around the mouse cursor.
desmousespotlighta.message: If the light is off, show a spotlight around the mouse cursor.

desmousespotlightc.description: If the light is off, you can select an area to focus a item.
desmousespotlightc.message: If the light is off, you can select an area to focus a item.

desmousespotlightt.description: If the light is off, click through the element.
desmousespotlightt.message: If the light is off, click through the element.

despassword.description: When the lights go back on, it ask you to enter your password.
despassword.message: When the lights go back on, it ask you to enter your password.

desplaylist.description: Show the YouTube playlist on the YouTube website.

desreadera.description: Always show the dimness level bar when the lights go out.
desreadera.message: Покажи плъзгача за промяна на яркостта докато страницата е затъмнена.

desreadern.description: Never show the dimness level bar.
desreadern.message: Не показвай плъзгача за промяна на яркостта.

desrememberpage.description: If this option is enabled, it will show you not the remember page.
desrememberpage.message: If this option is enabled, it will show you not the remember page.

dessharebutton.description: Show the share buttons of YouTube for this video.

desshortcutlight.description: to enable all the shortcuts opportunities.
desshortcutlight.message: to enable all the shortcuts opportunities.

desspotlightradius.description: is the diameter of the search lamp.
desspotlightradius.message: is the diameter of the search lamp.

dessuggestions.description: Show the suggestions of the YouTube website.
dessuggestions.message: Не скривай подобни видео клипове на YouTube сайта.

destime.description: Lights off between the following times:
destime.message: Lights off between the following times:

desvideoheadline.description: Show and invert the color of the video title.

desviewcount.description: Show the number of view for this video.
desviewcount.message: Покажи броя на изглед за това видео.

donatepromotext.description: If you can make a donation of any amount, I'd appreciate it immensely!
donatepromotext.message: Ако можеш да помогнеш с малка сума пари на автора, ще ти бъде изключително благодарен!

eastereggsquestion.description: Do you like a real movie theater?
eastereggsquestion.message: Do you like a real movie theater?

enjoyshare.description: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.
enjoyshare.message: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.

helpautoplay.description: The 'Eye protection' is enabled. To use the below feature, disable the 'Eye protection' option.
helpautoplay.message: The 'Eye protection' is enabled. To use the below feature, disable the 'Eye protection' option.

helpeyeprotection.description: When you enable the 'Eye protection' option, it will default disable the 'Auto Play' option.
helpeyeprotection.message: When you enable the 'Eye protection' option, it will default disable the 'Auto Play' option.

longdonatetext.description: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for the other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!
longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for the other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

shortcutalllights.description: to do the lights off on all open tabs page.
shortcutalllights.message: to do the lights off on all open tabs page.

shortcuteyeprotection.description: to enable/disable the eye protection feature.
shortcuteyeprotection.message: to enable/disable the eye protection feature.

showremember.description: doesn't show this remember page again when I open the option page.
showremember.message: doesn't show this remember page again when I open the option page.

skipremember.description: Skip this, and open now the option page
skipremember.message: Skip this, and open now the option page

titelautowidthyoutube.description: Set the YouTube player automatic to the large mode.
titelautowidthyoutube.message: Set the YouTube player automatic to the large mode.

titelcinemaontop.description: Movie theater mode: it show the 'lights off' layer only on the top of the window.
titelcinemaontop.message: Movie theater mode: it show the 'lights off' layer only on the top of the window.

titeldownloadupgrade.description: This upgrade add support for focus the selected image. And show a gallery of the images on that webpage.
titeldownloadupgrade.message: This upgrade add support for focus the selected image. And show a gallery of the images on that webpage.

titelqualityyoutube.description: Use automatic the HD quality of the YouTube video.
titelqualityyoutube.message: Use automatic the HD quality of the YouTube video.

titelsyncbrowser.description: Sync the extension settings with your other browser.
titelsyncbrowser.message: Sync the extension settings with your other browser.

warningtextambilight.description: If it's impossible to show the real atmosphere lighting because of security rule. It will show the one solid color effect.
warningtextambilight.message: If it's impossible to show the real atmosphere lighting because of security rule. It will show the one solid color effect.
